Paragraph: This study investigated the expression of nuclear factor - kappaB ( NF - kappaB ) , mitogen - activated protein ( MAP ) kinases and macrophages in the renal cortex and structural and functional renal changes of rats treated with gentamicin or gentamicin + pyrrolidine dithiocarbamate ( PDTC ) , an NF - kappaB inhibitor .
